title: New & MPFree: Shield Your Eyes – Larkspur
body:
**Shield Your Eyes** are a truly exciting prospect for modern guitar music.

Anyone who’s ever seen them ply their fractured (in pretty much every sense of the word) antics live will attest to that. Mainman Stef smashes out seemingly arbitrary lead lines on a busted-up mutant of a guitar, to fearsomely competent beats and skewed basslines. If a string breaks, well fuck it. They’ll blast on regardless. Somehow, amongst all the frantic noise, there’s buckets of lopsided melody – one listen to new track _Larkspur_, from forthcoming release **_Volume 4_**, and you’ll understand what I mean. Head over to the [Function Records](www.functionrecords.com "I'd usually put a witty remark here, but in all seriousness, awesome British record label with some awesome bands. Support 'em.") [bandcamp](http://functionrecords.bandcamp.com/track/larkspur "It looks like one link, but it's two?! WHAT THE FUCK IS HAPPENING?! Aah. Equilibrium restored.") for a free download. Shield Your Eyes have two more dates on our shores before embarking on a European tour, so catch ’em while you can!
